Taco Seasoning

spice blend
mexican

Ingredients

  • 2 tbsp chili powder
  • 1 tbsp ground cumin
  • 2 tsp cornstarch
  • 2 tsp kosher salt
  • 1 1/2 tsp hot smoked paprika
  • 1 tsp ground coriander
  • 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper

Procedure

  1. Combine all spices in a jar and shake to mix
